name: vue-webpack
description: This boilerplate intended for vue boilerplate from scratch using webpack
author: Marvin Petate

scripts.build: npm run clean; webpack build --config config/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=dev --config config/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:uat: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=uat --config config/webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean; webpack build --env variant=prod --config config/webpack/webpack.config.js
